events.message: I ordered a jacket last week and received the wrong size. I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to receiving wrong size merchandise and customer wants money back.
Customer support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund case for the wrong size jacket order.
Hello! I’m Sarah from customer support. I understand you want to return your jacket and receive a refund. I’m here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in original packaging for the refund process?
Thank you for your quick response. My order number is 987654321, and yes, the jacket is unused and still in its original packaging.
We will initiate your refund as soon as we receive the returned jacket. I will send you a prepaid shipping label by email shortly.
That sounds great, thank you! I appreciate the quick handling and the prepaid label will make returning easy.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear on your card within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thank you very much for your excellent support throughout this process.
Closing the case now as the refund was successfully processed and the customer confirmed receipt and satisfaction.
